price: Warreen amananii, gaggaarii hojjatan, Jannanni Firdaws qubannoota isaaniif taatee jirti.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
